# Clear Environment

```{r}
# | echo: true
# | eval: true

rm(list = ls())
```

# Load libraries

```{r}
# | echo: true
# | eval: true

# Loading relevant packages used in the project
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(readr)

```

## Load data

```{r}
# | echo: true
# | eval: true

dir.create(path = "data/_raw", recursive = TRUE)

path_to_file <- "data/_raw/PCOS_data_without_infertility.xlsx"

# List all sheet names to see which sheet to load
sheet_names <- excel_sheets(path_to_file)
print(sheet_names)

# Load a specific sheet by name
data_new <- read_excel(path_to_file, sheet = "Full_new")

file.exists(path_to_file)

print(head(data_new))
```
